summary: A sexually frustrated serial killer takes a liking to a woman he comes across.
cast: Marc Barbé|Elina Löwensohn|Géraldine Voillat|Coralie|Maxime Mazzolini|Alexandra Noël|Annick Lemonnier|Sadija Sada Sarcevic|Lea Civello|Astrid Combes|Sylvie Granato|Tony Baillargeat|Marc Berman|Martine Vandeville|Antoine Debilly|Ghislaine Gras
title: Sombre
